title: Heyui67
author: Heyui67
content: It's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Gamble with the amount of money that you can afford to lose. If you can afford to lose $2000, then you can gamble with it. If you see gambling as a way of making money, that is the worst indiscipline that you have in gambling, never depend on gambling at all other than seeing it as fun and entertainment and not going beyond that.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: If you are earning from affiliate programs of casinos, then it could be possible that you will make an average of $100 per day. But if you are a plain gambler targeting $100 per day, I doubt you could make it. Between a gambler and the house, there is not even a fair equation. The house is always a step ahead. Although there are times when you get lucky and win against the house, in the long run, it will always be the house that prevails. And, of course, casinos are not a place to make a living. They are more of a place to squander money.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: The game is based on luck and you know you couldn't be that lucky every day. It's not possible. If there is a strategy that would make money every day, we would all be doing it already.This is not the kind of game that we use to play where there are numbers as clues on every block. It's pure guessing which one doesn't explode.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: How can you think to have/to make a stable income/profit from gambling which is something that wont give you any guarantee? The answer is simply NO, there is no way for you to make $100 daily from gambling unless you are the casino owner or you are working as one of their staffs which give you a big salary every day.

comments.author: BitDane
comments.body: Gambling is a game of chance so there is no guarantee that you will always win when playing in a casino.  Even with sports betting, we cannot 100% say that we will win the bet because even if we bet on the crowd's favorite, there is always a chance of upset.If you have money then why not invest it to something else to gain passive income.  If you don't want to part with gambling industry, then you can search for starting casinos that is looking for investors and earned from there.Always remember, gambling is a business and they are created not to give away money but profit from its service instead.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: This is impossible. If this were possible, then everybody of us here must have already been doing that, earning nicely and regularly from gambling. And if this is also possible, then casinos should already be extinct by now because they will surely be losing so much money from gamblers. But the opposite is actually happening. Gamblers are losing and casinos are earning. The number of casinos are now growing. They are making big money from the losses of gamblers.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: OP for sure is misunderstanding how gambling works. And for sure even how much your capital for gambling is, you can't guarantee 100% that you will make profits especially since OP wants constant profits/winnings which will not really work on gambling.Much better OP to start trying to play with a small amount (the amount that you can afford) and get back here to analyze what we are saying.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day It's gambling, there are no sure fire profits like a daily job that will make you $100. Risk, element of luck and other factors to make daily profits for you. I think for a gambling you should know that.But if you feel that you are lucky and can go it, then by all means gamble that $2k balance of yours and see how far can you go and make more money out of that initial capital.

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day If you want a strategy that guarantees you $100 daily, then you need to look for another investment that is far away from gambling.Most people will say the same, while some might even suggest some surefire techniques... be wary of them all, the house always wins.Use gambling for fun, and maybe make a profit now and then, but never gamble for the purpose of making a daily profit... it's pretty insane to think that's possible.Play prudently, always.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: It is difficult to earn that mostly in gambling because gambling has no guaranteed strategy to win on it daily because gambling is made for entertainment and  not for living but I dont know with others if they made a living on it but for me it is difficult to earn profit on daily basis unless it is trading but you have an edge if you do sports betting but to other games it is difficult

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AM.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day In general, if you're talking about typical casino games, no. All you're going to do is lose money in the long run, even though in the short term you may have winning sessions. To win money in the long run you should try sports betting, poker or some say horse racing, things like that. But those disciplines need a lot of study to be able to make money, as well as self-control and good bankroll management to withstand the rough patches.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day for example, how can you benefit when you come to a nightclub? whereas you bring 2k for extra beers and food it's just a bonus. whereas on the other hand you come to an entertainment place to seek pleasure, not a place to earn income, unless the entertainment venue gives you a ticket when you enter and there is a lottery and if you are lucky you get the prize. it's highly unlikely an entertainment venue will earn you a profit if it's built to make a profit.simple explanation maybe you can understand.just as gambling is built to turn the gambler's profit and it is difficult to give you $100 profit daily, it is almost impossible unless you are really lucky. whereas luck will not come every day.so don't expect too much in gambling, just enjoy each of your betting sessions enough to entertain yourself and if you get a win consider it as a bonus.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Expecting regular wins and the same amount is impossible.Or you mean passive income, maybe there is if you work a little hard looking for loyalty programs or reward points at some casinos. But the offer of 5% profit per day is clearly too high, don't expect it to come from a legitimate casino company.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day Forget it, I do not think you even realize what you are asking, 100 dollars per day is 5% of your balance and at the end of the year you will have 36500 dollars, which is many times over your initial balance, and if you compounded your profits daily for a whole year then you could get 108 million dollars, no I did not made a mistake, that is the amount you could possibly get by making that much money with such a low balance, and if those numbers seem unrealistic then you need to acknowledge the same is true for your desire to make that money with gambling.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Instead of using $ 2k to play gambling, it's better for you to use $ 2k to trade because the chances of getting a profit will be greater if you trade.But of course, you need to learn and have analytical skills and expertise to make a profit.But if you don't have time to study, maybe just buying and holding bitcoins would be better than gambling.So forget if you want to profit from gambling because it's not worth doing, especially if you want to make $100 daily.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on April 20, 2023, 12:51:24 AMIf you are earning from affiliate programs of casinos, then it could be possible that you will make an average of $100 per day. Affiliate marketing is not that easy there is too much competition and it would take a lot of time and effort to earn $100 a day. There is nothing like quick bucks in affiliate marketing.Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day No, you cannot earn $100 daily through gambling. There might be a few days when you might hit a jackpot but most of the time you will lose your money. If you can afford to lose 2k then go ahead and give it a try. I would say invest this money in something constructive rather gambling it.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: If you want a guarantee, then affiliates. Maybe promos and bonuses if you're lucky as well since you may get them as add-ons without spending much, but they still require you to spend and require you to actually win to actually profit. Other than those, the usual method of gambling is rather risky and wouldn't guarantee a $100 daily, nor does streaming for promotions/advertising plausible of you're not streaming yourself and have a sizeable audience. Other than those can't really think up of another way to earn money really.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 12:26:24 AMIt's been awhile I try daily to make profitStake casino mostly minesBut it take back profit.. I have 2k balance.. is there methodTo get 100 $ per day There is no method if its luck based games, if there is then the casinos will lose and eventually go bankrupt, everything relies on luck which is why it's advisable that you only allocate money that you can afford to lose, and you treat gambling platform as an entertainment portal enjoy playing when you get hit by luck be thankful to withdraw your winnings and enjoy but don't expect that you can do it again, every session is different from every session so your main goal should be to enjoy every session.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Yes you can, just place your $2,000 in dice game and bet it with 1.05 odds, if you win you will earn $100 and you can play it again tomorrow, but if you lose, you shouldn't cry There's no method, it's not possible to make $100 daily without taking any risk. Even a daily trader don't have any guarantee he will always make $100 daily profit with $2,000.
